member.name: ID2D1Device5.CreateDeviceContext
member.summary: Creates a new device context with no initially assigned target.
member.param: Options for creating the device context.
member.returns: This method returns an HRESULT success or error code.

member.name: ID2D1Device5
member.summary: Represents a resource domain whose objects and device contexts can be used together. This interface performs all the same functions as the interface. It also enables the creation of objects.
